name: Big Deer Hunter
description:
Are you ready to become an expert deer sniper hunter? Deer Hunt Jungle Sniper is an amazing realistic and exotic wild animal and deer hunting game of 2017 where your huntsman shooting and sniping skills are going to be heavily tested. In hunters of wild deer game you are on a deer hunting expedition where you have to hunt deer and kill other wild animals like lions, wolves, buffaloes that are after your target.

Big Deer Hunter is all about thrill, shooting and wilderness in beautiful and vast forest aim land. Remember, Deer is a smart and clever animal so you need to be alert and professional deer huntsman. So get ready to go wild in faraway exotic forest where you need to achieve your hunting objectives as a brave deer huntsman! Perfect hunters of wild deer game is here.

FEATURES of Big Deer Hunter:
• First person sniper 3D shooting for animal and deer hunting.
• Amazing wild jungle and cold snowy forest environment with deer hunting games free.
• Massive range of wild animals and deer to Shoot & Kill as real sniper.
• Awesome gun controls and superb huntsman shooting and killing experience.
• Realistic sniper gun shooting and wild deer behavior.
